attributes.action: recognise the Sovereignty of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
EU nations including Britain, France and Germany will recognise Kosovo's sovereignty at a meeting of foreign ministers in Brussels on Monday.
When will you do the same for the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
